label: TransportationWasteMaterialComponent
comment: An unused and rejected as unwanted component of transport material resulting from transportation.

datatypeProperties.comment: The estimated measure for this generated transportation waste material component.
The measure of the maximum dedicated storage capacity for this transportation waste material component.
The planned measure for this discharged transportation waste material component.
A delivery event for this remaining transportation waste material component.
The measure for this retained transportation waste material component.

referencedBy.comment: A material component included in this transportation waste.
